title: Need Karloff Positive
content: Looking to 'acquire' the Karloff Positive font. Can anyone help me with that?
author: FM_Treezy

comments.content:
If by 'acquire' you mean license, it looks like you can get it here:

[http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/karloff\_positive](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123045252/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/karloff_positive "http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/karloff\_positive")

Presumably for your museum collection?  
e.g.  
 [http://www.switched.com/2011/01/25/moma-acquires-23-groundbreaking-fonts...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123045252/http:/www.switched.com/2011/01/25/moma-acquires-23-groundbreaking-fonts-for-design-exhibit/ "http://www.switched.com/2011/01/25/moma-acquires-23-groundbreaking-fonts-for-design-exhibit/")

Did you manage to get a free copy?

hhp
